title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an egg yolk in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about egg yolks by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a vision: Eating a boiled egg yolk in a dream is one of the visions that shows the good and great nutrition that he will receive. Seeing a lot of egg yolks in a dream is evidence of a lot of money that the dreamer will earn and a good and permissible profit. Also, seeing an egg yolk scratched with a stick Or hanging in a dream indicates that it is one of the dreams that indicate the dreamer’s marriage to a virgin woman. Collecting egg yolks in a bowl in a dream is good news, a life full of luxury and harvesting a lot of food. Seeing yourself collecting egg yolks in a dream is considered one of the praiseworthy visions For success and marriage for the dreamer. Eating egg yolks in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about eating boiled egg yolks for unmarried women is one of the dreams that indicate a close marriage with a good man. Also, seeing cooked egg yolks in a dream indicates a happy life, joys, and good nutrition. Seeing a collection of Egg yolk in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates marriage, the fulfillment of desires, success, and success in her life. Cooking egg yolks or frying them in hot oil is a dream for days full of hot and important events. Interpretation of a dream about egg yolks for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing an egg yolk smelling bad in a dream for a woman indicates corruption. And uselessness in the world. Seeing a boiled egg yolk in a dream for a married woman is one of the praiseworthy visions, which indicates kindness and great living. Egg yolks in a woman’s dream are evidence of a calm and stable life and the end of the problems she faces. Interpretation of a dream about egg yolks for a married woman: Seeing egg yolks scattered On the ground in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the unpleasant visions and a sign of worries and troubles. Eating egg yolk in a dream for a pregnant woman is considered desirable, and an indication of goodness and blessings, as it indicates ease of birth. Interpretation of a dream about egg yolk for a manInterpretation of seeing an egg yolk in a dream for a man indicates However, he will marry a virgin and this is beneficial for him. If one sees himself eating egg yolks in a dream for men, this also indicates a good and great diet that he will follow. Seeing yourself eating boiled egg yolks in a dream indicates moving to a new life and getting a promotion at work. Interpretation of seeing a raw egg yolk in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a raw egg yolk shows a woman in a dream, as it is evidence of a righteous and pious woman. Breaking an egg yolk or a yolk in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate the dreamer’s worries and sorrows. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment. below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Learn about the virtue of seeing the Messenger in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The virtue of seeing the Messenger in a dream: Seeing the Noble Messenger in a dream is one of the things that everyone longs to see his honorable face and his great pride and honor that many people want to reach. This vision symbolizes many good things and great benefits that the dreamer will obtain in reality and the happy things that he talks about in his life. In the following lines, all the details are presented from dream interpretation scholars about the virtue of seeing the Messenger in a dream... So follow us. The virtue of seeing the Messenger in a dream is considered a vision. The Messenger in a dream is one of the good dreams that bring great honor and pride to the pioneer, which is what all Muslims seek. If the dreamer sees the Messenger in a dream, it is good news from the Lord that the dreamer is a good person and close to God Almighty, and that faith infuses his life with the grace of God. If he sees The dreamer is a messenger in a dream, this means comfort, protection, and goodness that befalls a person in this world, and that he will enjoy Paradise in the afterlife, with the permission of the Lord. When the dreamer sees that the Messenger in a dream is smiling and happy, this is a very good sign and portends comfort and stability in life, the dreamer’s closeness to God and his walking on the right path and that the Lord will bless him with kindness. And his blessings in life. If the fortune teller sees the Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace - in a dream and his face is sullen, this indicates that the fortune teller is retarded in his obedience and does not carry out his duties during the season. When a merchant sees the Messenger of God in a dream, it is good news and an increase in money, and the fortune teller acquires a lot. One of the enormous means of livelihood that the fortuneteller will gain, God willing. If there is a person in debt and he sees the Messenger in a dream, this is a vision of relief and changing circumstances for the better for sure and he will obtain a lot of money that will make the dreamer pay. of his debts and obtain a better standard of living. The secrets of expert dream interpretation includes an elite group of the country's leading interpreters of dreams and visions. The website is in Arabic. To reach him, type the Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams website in Google. The virtue of seeing the Messenger in a dream is according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing the Holy Messenger has many virtues and benefits for the pioneer, and he reaps many benefits, whether in this world or the afterlife, God willing. If the dreamer is poor and sees The Messenger of God in a dream, this means that God will grant him much of His bounty, and save him from the poverty that has exhausted him and from the hardships of life. He will gain many benefits that will come to him and his family kindly. If the dreamer is suffering from a serious and difficult illness and sees the Messenger of God in the dream, this means that he will get rid of this illness, his health will improve greatly, and he will return to his normal life again. If the prisoner sees the Messenger of God in a dream, this A very good sign that he will be released soon, on vacation, and return to his family, and the Lord will help him start his life again. For the traveler that there are two people in a competition and that one of them wins by twisted and illegal means and the other saw the Messenger in a dream, this indicates that whoever sees the Messenger has God commanded him to succeed and he will win with God’s help and grace. As a

title: Interpretation of the sea in a dream

preview.html: One of the types of dreams that some people search for their meanings is the interpretation of the sea in a dream. It may have come to you before and you could not interpret it. If we look at the sea in reality, you will find that it is one of the most beautiful natural landscapes created by God Almighty, as its blue color blends with the color of the sky to form a stunning view. But is seeing it in a dream something that is also loved or does it indicate something that is hateful? This is what you will discover through An encyclopedia provides you with the meaning of this dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin presented several different interpretations of this dream. Seeing it may indicate the fulfillment of what the dreamer wants. And whoever sees that he is urinating in the sea, this indicates that he has done something wrong and will not stop doing it. It indicates Seeing the sea in a dream indicates the presence of a just and powerful king. Whoever sees in his dream that he is pouring sea water, this indicates the good that the dreamer will receive and may indicate that he will give birth to a male child. And whoever dreams of seeing the sea from afar, this indicates a misfortune for the dreamer. If you see the dreamer floating in cloudy water stained with mud, this indicates that he will encounter a problem that will happen to him in the near future, and God knows best. If he dives into the sea and drowns, it means that he will die as a witness in reality, and God knows best. Bathing in sea water in a dream indicates death. Sadness and the approach of the Gulf. Whoever sees himself crossing the sea from one shore to another, this indicates that he will be saved by someone who finds him from God, and the same applies in the event that he sees himself emerging from the sea. Among Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of Saber Al-Bahr is that it indicates that the dreamer will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Interpretation of the sea in a dream for a single woman: Seeing the sea for free people in general indicates the achievement of the goals that she was striving for in reality, and it is also evidence of the stability of her life. To see the calm sea in a person’s dream means success and the success that she will achieve in reality. As for seeing The stormy sea is not good for her, as it indicates the differences that you will face, whether they are family problems, with friends, or with friends. Colleagues. Seeing a raging sea in a dream also indicates the failure of her romantic relationship in reality. Seeing high waves for single people indicates the obstacles they will face in reality or the presence of disagreements or the occurrence of some illness for them, and God knows best. Interpretation of the sea in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s vision of a calm sea indicates On the stability of her marital life, it indicates that she will have good offspring or achieve the goals that she was striving for. Seeing the sea for a married woman indicates her repentance to God and her return to Him in reality. In the case of seeing a raging sea, this indicates marital strife in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream The sea for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in the sea in a dream means goodness in general and achieving what she wants. Whoever sees in her dream that she is drinking from sea water shows the goodness and nourishment that she will receive in reality. If a pregnant woman sees that she is bathing in sea water, this indicates that she will receive An easy birth and will reduce the pain of pregnancy and childbirth. In the end, only God knows the unseen and all

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white snake for unmarried, divorced, and pregnant women

preview.html: But seeing a snake in a dream has a different interpretation depending on its shape and color, as well as the movement it makes, as well as the dreamer’s actions towards this snake. Each situation has its own interpretation. Each vision has a specific meaning for the dreamer, and to learn more of these interpretations and explain them better, follow us. Interpretation of a vision A white snake in a dream for one girl. Ibn Sirin sees an unmarried girl seeing a white snake in a dream. An expression of the presence of many enemies around her in reality but they did not wish her all the time. It is considered a good vision for a girl. It also represents seeing a white snake in a dream in general. The expression About the presence of an enemy that does not benefit her in life and the main reason that causes her problems. The unmarried girl who sees the snake in her dream. It is an expression of her suffering from many emotional problems that greatly affect her life. In the event that the white snake appears in the dream of a single girl and the girl makes it She disappears. This is evidence that she is a girl who knows God Almighty in everything she does. Moreover, she will improve her life better in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a white snake in a dream about a married woman. A married woman sees a white snake in a dream. An expression that he will get rid of all problems Which this woman suffers from. Whether these problems are related to her life or her work. A married woman if she sees a white snake in a dream. It is an expression of the weakness of the enemy who is trying to destroy her life, so this is good news for a married woman. As for seeing a white snake in a dream. Evidence of That she will get rid of the worries that she suffers from in her life. If he suffers from some diseases, this is evidence that he will recover soon. A married woman sees herself in a dream attacking a white snake. It is an expression of her being a good person who protects her children, her husband, and her home. Which makes her suffer from many problems. Which she is going through in her life. And that God Almighty will grant her great sustenance in the future. We chose for you: The snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing a white snake in a dream for a divorced woman. The vision in which a divorced woman sees the white snake. It is an expression that will get rid of him from many of the problems that he suffers from. And that All her worries will go away. It appears that you see a white snake in a dream. It is an expression that her enemy is a weak person and that this person may have done some magic for her. If a divorced woman sees a white snake, she will soon be overwhelmed by fears. Seeing a divorced woman attack may indicate a white snake And the success in killing him. It is evidence that she is a well-qualified woman. He respects God Almighty in everything he does. And thus God Almighty saves her from all her problems. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a white snake in a dream for a manWhen a man sees in his dream a white snake inside his clothes It is evidence that this person will be exposed to poverty and a great loss of his money. If a man sees a white snake in his dream but does not approach it, it is an expression that many of his enemies are trying to destroy his life. These enemies could be one of his closest friends. So beware of all people who Around him. In case the man sees that there

title: Interpretation of a dream about my deceased father hitting me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about my deceased father hitting me in a dream If you, dear reader, are looking for an interpretation of a dream about my deceased father hitting me in a dream, we provide all this and more details..Interpretation of a dream about my deceased father hitting me in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my deceased father hitting me in a dream can indicate To warn the son against committing sins, and God knows everything. If the dreamer sees the deceased father hitting him, then he can warn the son against doing wrong actions, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her father hitting her in a dream, this may mean that he is warning against sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If A married woman saw a dead father beating her in a dream. This may represent a warning to the woman against committing wrong actions, and God knows all that he did not see. Interpretation of a dream about my father hitting me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream where my father hits me in a dream could express affection, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her father He hits her, and the beating is painful, so it may be a reference to matters in her territory that her father does not approve of, and God knows everything that he does not see. Also, beating in a dream indicates love, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a divorced woman sees being beaten in a dream, it may express affection and closeness to her father, And God knows everything that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my father hitting my mother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father hitting my mother in a dream may express understanding and harmony, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a father hitting a mother indicates an understanding of the father and mother, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees a father hitting her mother, it may be This is a sign of love and tenderness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees her father beating her mother, she may resort to the affection that unites a father with her mother, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream in which I carry my father in my arms in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which my father was carrying me in his arms in a dream may indicate that He carries responsibilities, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his father carrying him in a dream, he can express his responsibility that his father carried out, and God knows all that he did not see. When an unmarried girl sees her father carrying it, this may indicate that he bears responsibility, and God knows best. In the event that a young man sees Carrying his father bears responsibility, and God knows all the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my father going for Hajj in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father going for Hajj in a dream can indicate faith and justice, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his father going for Hajj in a dream, this may indicate that things are right, and God knows all. What no one has seen. If a married woman sees her father going for Hajj in a dream, it may express good things, and God knows all that no one has seen. If an unmarried girl sees her father going for Hajj, she may end up paying debts, God willing. Interpretation of dreams for my father slaughtering a sheep. However, seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dream could be evidence of getting rid of the experience, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of dreams to see someone I know in a dream and its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams when I see someone I know in a dream, especially because it is considered one of the things that many people own, because there are many well-known people in this life and it is normal to see them in a dream, but sometimes it causes many people to be curious about the meanings of these dreams and their connections. It is a good or bad dream, and during these lines we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing someone I know in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone I know in a dream, as seeing familiar people in a dream is considered one of the confusing visions that arouses the curiosity of many to know its meanings, and it is considered a positive vision or one of the Negative visions, and in this paragraph we present to you the interpretation of dreams when I see someone I know in a dream is also: If the person is an acquaintance or a family member and he is seen several times in a dream. This dream is evidence that the dreamer loves him in reality and is closely related to him. If he sees in a dream That he gets something from this person. This vision is evidence that she will do something to him that will sadden him and break his mind. Seeing someone I know in a dream can be a good sign. If the person actually dies, and the fortuneteller takes money or food from him. This indicates that the dreamer will live in Days of comfort and luxury. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing bare feet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone I know who is single, as this vision in a single girl’s dream has many interpretations, meanings and connotations that it includes, which differ based on the details that appear in the dream. The dream, and along these lines we explain it to you. The interpretation of a dream to see someone I know who is single is also: If someone sees in a dream someone he knows in his home, this is evidence of the strength of the relationship between them over time. This vision also indicates the dreamer’s emotional connection to the person he saw. If someone smiles In a dream while sitting with the fortuneteller, the conversation is full of affection. This dream is evidence of the continuation of the relationship between them. But if the conversation between them is reminiscent of a fight, this indicates a break in the relationship or the emergence of problems between them in the next period of their lives. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Crying in detail in the grave. Interpretation of a dream about talking to someone I know about being single. It is considered one of the strange visions that many people have. It is considered one of the confusing visions, and it is not clear whether it is a good vision or one of the bad visions, and in this paragraph you will learn. About the interpretation of the dream of talking to someone I know about being single is also: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream someone she knows and talks to constantly. This is evidence of love and an intimate relationship between them in reality. If he sees someone he knows, and talks to him in a dream, but he has not seen him for a while in reality This dream is a symbol of this girl’s longing for this person. It also indicates that the sign has been cleared of the problem she was facing in the current period. Also, if an unmarried woman sees someone she knows, she is talking to him in the dream, and giving her a gift. It is a dream that indicates to

title: Interpretation of an airport in a dream: A dream about waiting at the airport

preview.html: Airport Seeing the airport in a dream for individuals Airport in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiWaiting at the airport in a dreamInterpretation of the airport lounge in a dreamI dreamed that I was at the airportDreamed that I was at the airportInterpretation of a dream about the airport and luggageInterpretation of dreams about the airport and the planeSometimes the sleeper sees in his sleep as if he is entering an airport from the main gate, and then he sees himself in the waiting room in Waiting for departure time. This dream scene indicates that the dreamer is going through a pivotal stage in his life and is waiting for an important issue that will lead him to the future. It is as if the airport in this dream scene is a point that occupies space and time at the same time, and this means that the future of the dreamer and his actions depend on changing the place or rather leaving. Interpretation of a room Waiting or going out in a dream It is that room in which the fortuneteller sits after loading the bags and displaying his passport for security purposes, where the dreamer sits for a while and is ready to board the plane. Sometimes it is strange that this room suddenly turns into a regular room. The home and the travelers turn into people of parents and relatives, and sometimes the atmosphere changes because of travel. To other, unrelated atmospheres. Travel. The waiting scene also turns into a dinner, a wedding, an engagement, or even a procession. Consequently, the position and role of the viewer changes from a traveler to someone who has nothing to do with the journey. Why this change in the scenes? The reason for this is the viewer’s reluctance to change or move, as he is fixed in his place and does not move without searching or searching. Acting, and what moves in his life is nothing but imagination and speech. Meaning that the dreamer has great ambitions and often talks about them in front of people, but he does not budge an inch to complete or achieve them! These are young people who have the idea of ​​travel, success and wealth outside their country and they are the most unsuccessful people even in them, and the dream in this context is a warning to the individual about the necessity of chasing the goal before speaking. About him, so why do we say he kills the act! A dream of waiting for someone at the airport. In another scene from the airport dreams, the sleeper sees as if he is waiting for someone he knows. It may be a relative, a couple, or an important friend. In this vision, it is the reality of arriving and meeting. If the waiting person arrives and is loved, the desire in the mind is fulfilled, and if he cannot reach him or...with delay, the wish or dream may take longer to come true. The scene of waiting at the airport can be seen by single women. In a dream, a loved one may be waiting for him and upon his arrival there will be signs of welcome among his loved ones. A hug, a handshake, and a good welcome. This dream symbolizes a period of waiting for marriage, culminating in meeting a life partner or future. Even if the expected person is different from the groom, it inevitably refers to the future husband in addition to the expected girl, a woman or a girl like her. In the interpretation, this does not mean marriage, but it is a harbinger of success or the fulfillment of desires in other areas. Dreaming of saying goodbye to someone at the airport is the most difficult moment a person goes through while awake. It is the moment to say goodbye to the one you love, whether at the airport or anywhere else, and the meaning behind that is the

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a chair by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a chair in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, indicates the high status of the dreamer. It is also considered a symbol of luxury if the chair is beautiful and different. Sitting on a white chair in a dream means that you end problems and worries and enjoy a stable life. And the merchant sitting on a chair in his dream indicates that he He will make a large profit from his trade. Iron chairs in a dream are one of the visions that show a good future for the dreamer in his life. Luxurious chairs in the dreamer’s dream indicate that he will reap good and abundant sustenance for himself. See also: Interpretation of the Throne Verse in a dream Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for a single womanIf you see A chair in someone's dream, it means a life full of successes and the fulfillment of desires. Dreaming that she is studying in a chair indicates success and success in her studies. Looking at a chair with many chairs around it shows that there are many admirers of her. Her sitting in a desirable chair is a sign of marriage to The person she wants. Seeing a plastic chair in a dream for an unmarried woman means happiness and hearing good news. But sitting on a wooden chair can be evidence of many problems in her life. Iron chairs in her dream indicate a lot of sustenance and an abundance of goodness. See also: Interpretation Seeing a dream about wood in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a chair for a married womanSitting on a chair in a married woman’s dream is a sign of her high status. If a woman is sitting on a luxurious chair in her dream, this indicates her husband’s intense love for her. Sitting on a broken chair in a dream indicates the appearance Some problems in her life. Seeing an iron chair in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her high status at work. Interpretation of a dream about a wheelchair for a married woman indicates loneliness in her life and her husband’s neglect of her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wardrobe in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a chair for a pregnant woman and the wooden chair in A pregnant woman’s dream indicates a peaceful life and an end to worries and problems. A chair without a back is considered evidence that she has given birth to a baby girl. Also, a luxurious chair in a woman’s dream indicates the birth of a male child, and God knows what is in the womb. Seeing many chairs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing many chairs in a dream. The dream is evidence that the dreamer will collect some money from his trade. It is also a symbol of glaucoma, and sitting on chairs is considered success, success, and reaping benefits. Interpretation of seeing a lost chair in a dream: Seeing a lost chair in a dream indicates difficult days that this person will experience in his life. Also, seeing a chair is lost in a dream. Broken in a dream is considered one of the dreams that indicate anxiety, problems, and falling into conspiracies. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing long hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of long hair in a dream on the Moments website. Interpretation of long hair in a dream. Long hair in a dream in general is evidence of goodness, health and longevity. It is the abundance of sustenance and money. It is also an expression of superiority and creativity, as it indicates honesty and deep sincerity. Interpretation of long hair in A dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned many meanings and connotations of long hair in a dream, as he said: Whoever sees in a dream that his hair is long and black, this indicates the arrival of good and abundant money to the owner of this vision. While whoever sees that his hair is long, smooth and smooth, this indicates good health. If he is sick, he will recover and get rid of his illness. As for whoever sees his hair long and curly, this symbolizes the presence of some... Problems, disagreements, and complicated things in his life, and that he will overcome them with some turmoil and confusion, while whoever sees that his hair has become long like a horse, this indicates that the secret he is keeping will be revealed, and if he is sick, he will die. Read also: Interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream. Interpretation of long hair in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees her long hair in her dream, this indicates that she carries confidence with her and will keep it, because it indicates her long life and that there is great happiness that she will experience. Interpretation of long hair in a dream for a married woman. But if a woman gets married and sees long hair in a dream, this indicates that she She will become pregnant if she is barren, but if she sees that she is cutting her hair, this indicates that she will not give birth completely, and if, as a married woman sees, that her hair is long like silk, this means that she is blessed with her partner’s money and enjoys it, and it also shows the affection and love that remains between her and her partner. Interpretation of Hair Long hair in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for a woman who sees that her hair is long during pregnancy, this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy.

title: Interpretation of seeing rainwater entering the house

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rainwater entering the house in a dream for one girl: The entry of light rainwater expresses the abundance of livelihood that will appear before this girl in the coming days. If this girl desires to marry a specific man, then light rain entering her room in a dream portends the imminent realization of this Desire. As for the girl who is studying at this stage, light rain falling on her house portends her excellence in her studies this year. But if the rain is heavy and destructive, it often indicates that there will be difficult trials and many crises in the coming days. If the rain enters The house is accompanied by thunder and lightning, then it will face many obstacles and health problems in the future. If the girl feels happy while it is raining in her house, she will achieve the dreams and goals that she was striving to achieve. Seeing rain falling inside the house also indicates the emergence of many good job opportunities in the days Next. Read also: Interpretation of rain in a dream. Interpretation of seeing rainwater entering the house in a dream for a married woman. The entry of light rain and the dreamer’s feeling of happiness from it often reflects her enjoyment of a state of stability in her life with her husband. Seeing rain entering the house also symbolizes the multiplicity of halal means of livelihood that She will appear before this lady. If this woman is having problems conceiving, then the light rain in her bedroom portends this. With the imminent appearance of her pregnancy and the realization of this desire of hers. But if the rain falling inside the house is destructive, she will often experience many marital problems. And the big differences between her and her husband, and she can divorce the husband. Also, seeing heavy, destructive rain entering the house also symbolizes the emergence of many debts or a bad financial situation in the coming days. If rainwater falls in her children’s room, it is a vision that expresses her children’s good conditions and their excellence in studies. Light rain falling inside the house in a sick married woman’s dream often indicates the approach of her quick recovery. Interpretation of a dream about rainwater entering the house in a pregnant woman’s dream. Most interpretive scholars consider light rain a sign of easy childbirth and the imminent elimination of pregnancy problems. Seeing rainwater indicates that it is Entering the house also brings many good news that this lady will hear in the near future. Some interpreters consider that light rain symbolizes the birth of a girl, while heavy rain indicates the birth of a male child. If the rain entering the house is destructive, it can be exposed to many Health problems throughout pregnancy. If heavy rain enters a woman’s home in the first months of pregnancy, she may suffer a miscarriage and an incomplete pregnancy. If a pregnant woman feels happy while the rain enters her home, she will feel that her life will change for the better after giving birth. Interpretation of seeing rainwater entering The house in a dream for a divorced woman. Light rain entering the house symbolizes a change in this woman’s life for the better
